summaryItinerary: Day 1 (14 Jan): Da Nang Arrival – Free Leisure (No meal)
Day 2 (15 Jan): Private Marble Mountain & Hoi An Afternoon Tour (Breakfast)
Day 3 (16 Jan): Private Ba Na Hills & Golden Bridge Day Tour (Breakfast)

detailedItinerary.title: Da Nang Arrival – Free Leisure (No meal)
details: Arrive in Da Nang where the private driver meets you for transfer to the hotel for baggage storage.
Check-in available from 14:00; enjoy the remainder of the day at leisure.

detailedItinerary.title: Private Afternoon Marble Mountain – Hoi An Tour (Breakfast)
details: Breakfast at hotel and free time until afternoon departure.
15:15 – 15:45: Guide and driver pick up for Marble Mountain (Ngu Hanh Son) to explore the five-element peaks, Tam Thai Pagoda, Linh Ung Pagoda, and Non Nuoc stone village.
18:00: Depart to Hoi An Ancient Town for a walking tour covering Japanese Bridge, lantern streets, and riverside night market.
21:00: Drop off at hotel; overnight in Da Nang.

detailedItinerary.title: Private Ba Na Hills & Golden Bridge Tour (Breakfast)
details: 08:30: Private transfer along the scenic coastline to Ba Na Hills.
Ride UNESCO-record cable cars to visit Golden Bridge, French village, Linh Ung Pagoda, Fantasy Park, and Nui Chua Peak with Linh Tu Temple.
Descend by cable car and return to Da Nang around 17:00 – 17:30.
Evening at leisure; overnight in Da Nang.

detailedItinerary.title: Da Nang Departure (Breakfast)
details: Breakfast at hotel and check-out by 12:00.
Private transfer to Da Nang International Airport for departure flight.
